original_title: Individual income tax structure to be amended
original_body_lines: The Cabinet of Ministers has approved the proposal presented by the president  to take steps to amend the Inland Revenue Act No. 24 of 2024 so as to enable the imposition of necessary legal provisions to implement the following  reduction to the individual  income tax structure effective 01-04-2025 as follows
